title: QFI Research Capital
description: Algorithmic trading platform with mid‑frequency execution, real‑time analytics, risk management, and modular architecture. Built institutional‑grade data and execution pipelines with foundations for portfolio management and future AI‑driven signal generation.
contribution: Architected and led the initial build for four months (co‑founder → consultant). Implemented the core backend, real‑time streaming ingestion, Kafka pipelines, and aggregation layers feeding InfluxDB/PostgreSQL. Integrated risk engines and portfolio analytics, and set up service orchestration and observability to support production operations.
highlights: Mid‑frequency algorithmic trading with real‑time analytics and execution.
Kafka‑based streaming architecture: sub‑second ingestion, processing, and aggregation.
Risk engines and portfolio analytics; institutional‑grade automation and controls.
Modular microservices on Docker with resilient pipelines and observability.
Backtesting and simulation groundwork for strategy validation and tuning.
Multi‑asset support across equities and derivatives via unified data plane.
Foundations for AI signal generation and future portfolio management extensions.

title: Automated Property Appraisal Extraction
description: Automated PDF report extraction that converts unstructured appraisal PDFs into structured JSON using a dual OCR + LLM pipeline.
contribution: Architected and built a modular dual-pipeline (OCR + LLM) system with FastAPI and Streamlit, covering PDF splitting, image preprocessing, layout parsing, OCR, chunked LLM extraction, merging/deduplication, normalization, and API orchestration with centralized logging.
highlights: Dual-pipeline architecture: independent OCR and LLM components for modularity.
Automated PDF processing: splitting, preprocessing, layout parsing, OCR text extraction.
Intelligent LLM extraction: chunking, merging, deduplication, normalization for structured JSON.
FastAPI REST endpoints orchestrating OCR and LLM workflows; Streamlit dashboard for review/export.
Intermediate JSONL persistence for traceability and debugging; centralized logs and config.
Business impact: hours-to-minutes turnaround, reduced manual entry, improved accuracy, production-ready.

title: Automated ETL Pipeline
description: Standardizes 50+ county tax roll datasets per year, reducing analyst time by 85%.
contribution: Designed intelligent ETL system that learns from each dataset...
highlights: 85% reduction in analyst time (8 hours → 1 hour)
Self-learning: improves with each dataset processed
